item.title: [Side-Project] Movie App
item.description: Movie App - Frontend Movie App - Backend 簡介 開發這個App的目的主要是為了解決在搜尋電影OTT資源以及電影內容討論分散在多個不同平台等問題，如:搜尋到的資源是無效/

item.title: [Note]What Is JWT(Json Web Token)-EN
item.description: What is JWT(Json Web Token)? The full name of JWT is Json Web Token. Acccording to the definition, JWT is a proposed Internet standard for creating data with optinal signature and/or opntional encryption whose payload holds JSON that asserts some number of clamis. It’s used for identity authentication between client and the server that allows accessing resources in the server. The Structure of JWT JWT consists of three parts including:
